Description:
Dont wait to build - be in for Christmas
Bursting with family appeal and positioned in an impressive high growth area this Fairhaven home is only 12 months old and still under warranty.
Spacious, light and bright with generous living areas this sensational new home has all that of a modern young home, timber floors, clean white walls and quality window furnishings, comprising; 4 good sized bedrooms, the master with full en-suite, separate formal lounge room, white gloss kitchen boasting stone benches, quality stainless steel appliances, including built-in microwave, freestanding range cooker and a dishwasher. Family meals area leading to the outside entertaining alfresco at the rear with pergola.
Other features to note are; ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a single remote lockup garage with internal access and all enjoying a wonderful location, close to Officer train station, quality schools, parklands, convenient freeway access and a short drive to Westfield Fountain Gate, Berwick or Beaconsfield.
Insights: 5 Curtis Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Your time to reserve, the Reserve.

Description:
Quality Family Living Set on 1/4 acre - Built by Arden Homes
Built by Arden Homes, this cleverly designed home will suit any large family wanting space for the whole family, INSIDE and OUT!
Proudly sitting on a ¼ acre, this quality built home boasts:
- A wide formal entrance & hallway; giving an instant sense of space upon entry
- 4 oversized bedrooms; Master suite includes a huge walk-in robe, an impressive ensuite & gorgeous garden outlook. The 2nd bedroom is located next to the master at the front wing of the home being ideal for a nursery, guest/childrens room or home office, whilst the remaining 2 bedrooms are situated at the rear wing along with a separate theatre/living room, perfect for the kids or even in-law accommodation.
- A stunning & spacious kitchen featuring ceasarstone benchtops, smeg appliances, soft-close cabinetry and is complemented by a generous butlers pantry PLUS a large walk-in pantry.
- Open plan, yet cleverly separated dining/living areas, all of which can be overseen from the entertainers kitchen, as well as from the covered alfresco which overlooks the huge rear yard perfect for gatherings with family and friends all year round!
Additional features include:
Bi-fold windows and sliding doors to the outdoor alfresco/backyard, 9ft ceilings, gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, ceiling fans throughout, six-star energy rating, laminate floorboards throughout, an oversized double remote garage with internal access and SIDE ACCESS for additional cars, caravan, boat or trailer, as well as convenient access to the rear yard.
The attention to detail throughout the home is impeccable and the quality of the fittings and fixtures is exceptional. A MUST SEE!!!

Description:
Geoff Burkes Own Home
When Geoff Burke, the award-winning pool artist and landscaper, and his wife decided to lay down roots in Officer, they knew they wanted something a bit different and edgy; welcome to 9 Cliveden Drive, Officer. From the moment you step in, you can see this is not your everyday home. To the right you are welcomed with a massive home office, a place where Geoffs innovative ideas are first conceptualised. Moving through the home you will find the hidden oasis that is the master bedroom tucked away on the right complete with full ensuite and walk in robe, the further two bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom. Moving through to the rear is where the home really comes into its own, the stunning kitchen with stone benchtops and butlers pantry looks out over the open plan living and dining areas, the perfect place for entertaining. Outdoors is where Geoffs true artistry comes to the fore, the stunning pool and spa, are the centrepiece of the backyard with all the garden and greenery complimenting them perfectly. Complete with double glazed windows, ducted heating double garage and more, if you are looking for something out of the ordinary, then look no further.
View the video

Description:
Superb Officer Locale!
This beautifully presented Burbank home has been well designed and is a spacious single level property that is low maintenance. It is tailor made for downsizers, first homebuyers or an investor wanting to capitalise on the superb Officer locale. The focal point of the home is the open plan kitchen meals and living area that leads out to the large easy care 383 M2 block. The kitchen is modern with ample bench space, stainless steel appliances, stone benches and pantry.
Featuring 3 bedrooms, including master with en-suite and walk in robe, with the other 2 bedrooms having built in robes and easy access to the main bathroom.
Additional features include neutral-toned colours throughout; roller blinds, gas ducted heating, air conditioning for year-round comfort, double glazed windows, sliding doors to capture an abundance of natural light, aggregate concrete entertaining area, remote single garage with internal access.
The striking first impression with low maintenance landscaping outdoors will capture your attention. There is plenty of space for growing families looking for a serene environment to relax in, the garden is thoughtfully designed with easy care in mind. This modern home is a polished package, save yourself the hassle of building and move straight in.
Nestled in the sought-after Arcadia estate, short walking to parklands, top primary and secondary schools, Cardinia train station, Officer shopping area as well as easy access to the M1 freeway.
Don't delay, call Christine & Barry - Officer Property Experts

Description:
A home designed for the modern family!
This quality-built Henley home is only 2 years young; the original owners have kept the property in immaculate condition and ready for you to move straight in. This family home is spacious, peaceful and glistens with natural light throughout. Introduced by stunning timber laminate floors and quality finishes, four good sized bedrooms and a functional floorplan from front to back.
As you enter the well-appointed open plan kitchen, dining and second living zone you will be instantly impressed, featuring quality SMEG appliances, dishwasher, 900mm oven/induction cooktop, soft closing draws, breakfast bar, 40m stone bench tops with plenty of preparation space and a sizable walk in pantry. The master suite entices with a walk-in robe and generous sized ensuite showcasing a luxurious shower, double vanity and separate toilet. The three additional bedrooms are all great in size, two with walk in robes and remaining bedroom with a built-in robe, these rooms are conveniently serviced by the main bathroom, second toilet and two extra living zones.
Exceptional extras include; ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fan in Alfresco, sizable laundry, NBN connection, Foxtel points are installed in the main living, double glazed windows throughout all with block out blinds and additional insulation to eliminate outside noise.
Timber stacker doors open out to the fabulous decked alfresco which will be an absolute hit, creating the perfect entertaining space surrounded by an extremely low maintenance yard set on approx. 513m2. This house contains internal and external access to the double car remote garage. Additional exterior features include 3.7kw solar system with Batteries and garden shed storage.
Positioned on a corner allotment in the Cherrington Estate in Officer, directly adjacent to the Potters Grove and Timbertop Estates, this whole area is known for its fantastic location! Central to all amenities anyone would desire like, Arena Shopping Centre & Beaconsfield Shopping complex, a variety of fantastic schools, medical centres, sporting facilities and many eateries. Set a hop skip and a jump away from parklands which is a perfect place to take the kids and pets to play, and only a short walk to Officer train station. This is a must inspect, be quick to call today!
Internal area
222.96m²

Character filled & full of charm
IMPRESSIVE 640M2 BLOCK
APPROX 300 METERS TO ARENA PLAZA
SIDE ACCESS - BOATS/CARAVANS
With its list of inclusions and immaculate presentation throughout this impressive Porter Davis built home offers a real sense of warmth and character felt from the moment you arrive.
Perfectly situated only a few hundred meters away from the Arena plaza and only a short walk to St Francis Xavier college, St Clare's Primary school and public transport - this stunning home offers all the modern conveniences you would come to expect, some of which include:
4 Spacious bedrooms + Study Master suite complete with walk in robes, full ensuite, spa bath, oversized shower and double vanity
3 Living rooms perfect for any growing family
Fully appointed open plan kitchen featuring quality appliances, stone bench tops and walk in pantry
Gas ducted heating + Split system air conditioning
Freshly painted throughout
Outdoor entertaining area featuring retractable overhead canopy
Beautifully landscaped and manicured gardens
Double garage with additional side gate access
Dressed to impress with prime location to match, this truly stunning home simply won't last! Don't delay Contact Brad or Banjo to arrange your inspection TODAY!

Description:
MODERN LUXURIOUS EX - DISPLAY HOME
This unique display home designed and built by Innohomes is the definitive in ultra-modern and luxury living. This home will tick all the boxes and is suitable for all buyers. The home comes with a vast number of exclusive features, and premium fixtures and fittings, which are all for your enjoyment.
Downstairs offers 4 bedrooms, master bedroom with full height walk in robe and ensuite, 3 other bedrooms with built in robes, which have access to two other bathrooms, plus a living area and open study.
Upstairs we have a fully equipped kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, stone bench-tops with 40mm edging, full butlers pantry, glass splash backs, 900mm appliances, glass overhead and soft close cupboards, along with two spacious living areas and a balcony.
Plus, you will be amazed by the home cinema/games room with curved cinemascope (4.8m x 2m) UHD screen integrated with 7.2 sound system, stepped theatre style recliner seating, the room can be converted into a games room and comes with an electric height adjustable pool table.
Located in the highly regarded Timbertop Estate, on the northside of the Princes Highway and only 3kms to Beaconsfield Town Centre, 10 minutes to Westfield Fountain Gate and Monash Casey Hospital.
The perfect home for everyone!

Description:
A Downsizing Delight in Prime Locale
This contemporary family home offers instant appeal with its modern façade, inviting interior and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate in Officer which is highly desired for its affordability and family friendly environment.
Step inside this modern beauty and make your way to the heart of the home where the sun drenched open plan kitchen awaits, complete with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, overhead cabinetry and breakfast bar adjoining to the spacious living and meals area.
This well-designed home accommodates three generous sized bedrooms and two separate living zones. The master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. The additional two bedrooms both have built in robes and are conveniently serviced by the functional main bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional extras include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, laundry, double remote-control garage with internal and external access, low maintenance gardens to the front and back all positioned on a 414m2 approx. allotment.
If location is what matters to you then look no further, shops, public transport, easy freeway access, schools and more, all minutes away from your front door. Whether youre an investor, first home buyer or looking for a change, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes!

Description:
MODERN TOWNHOUSE WITH PARK VIEWS
Arguably one of the best townhouses in the complex we are proud to present to the market 15 Sable Circuit in Officer. On first impressions you will fall in love with the exterior of this property with timber cladding finish and situated amongst quiet parklands.
The floorplan of this fabulous property includes two living areas, 2 bedrooms and modern bathroom.
When you walk upstairs you will be encapsulated with 180 degrees views of parklands and beyond, not to mention plenty of natural light. The kitchen is functional and includes plenty of cupboard space, stainless appliances and titled splashback. Entertaining is fantastic year round with wrap around undercover balcony leading from the main living/dining area.
Added features include split system heating/cooling, separate laundry, large single lock up garage with remote control access and is conveniently located close to walking tracks, parklands, local schools, public transport, Officers new proposed town centre, Monash Freeway and shops.
This home is absolutely perfect for first home buyer or investor, this one will not last long, call me today.

Kitchen with all the modern appliances and a gorgeous 900 mm free standing oven/stove.Generous dining and lounge, there is plenty of room for the family. Additional Features include ducted heating, split system cooling you have everything you need.
Close to schools, shops, public transport with the freeway a few minutes away makes this the place to be.
Be quick to have a look as this won't last long.

Description:
HOW'S THE SERENITY? SO MUCH SERENITY
"When The Castle's Dale Kerrigan was talking about a bargain, he wasn't referring to jousting sticks, he was referring to 24 Ambleside Way."
Even though it's not located in Bonnie Doon the titled block is situated in the next best place - Heathfield Estate in Officer.
Just a smidge under 400sqm, the block features a 12.5 metre frontage and minimal fall.
Have I spoken about the vibe yet? Do yourself a favour and take a drive to the block. With captivating views over to the Western Port Bay you're also walking distance to St Brigid's Primary School, public transport and Officer's main strip of shops.
What a great place to build your first home or kick-off your investment portfolio. Who knows, you could even build your own pool room.
